jsonBody.data: {"inf":"POL01","c_id":198456,"cseq":6,"h_id":6469650,"type":"C","valid":"Y","caseno":668911253,"listno":"2nd","def_age":41,"def_dob":"18-08-1979","def_sex":"F","def_addr":{"line1":38,"line2":"Clarendon Road","pcode":"ad21 5dr","line3":"Glasgow"},"def_name":"Lenore Marquez","def_type":"P","offences":{"offence":[{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Glasgow attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Clemons Barron.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 24/03/2016 at Leeds stole PLAYSTATION 4 to the value of 300.00, belonging to Hull Obrien.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Aberdeen attempted to steal FLAT SCREEN TV to the value of 750.00, belonging to Howard Ashley.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Glasgow attempted to steal GAMES CONSOLES to the value of 750.00, belonging to Conner Powell.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"}]}}
